String.string: A secret door opens in the cellar.
Pull it together! You're here to fight, not see the sights!
If you must die, then die alone!
Such insolence! No one challenges an agent of Atel Akaad...and survives...
Come, Malgarios! Tear them limb from limb!
How? How could such puny amateurs defeat you? You'll rue the day, foolish interlopers, you hear me? Rue the day!
You will receive a boon in 1 minute.
